      • groupPublicKeysByWellKnownParty

        @NotNull
public static java.util.Map<net.corda.core.identity.Party,java.util.List> groupPublicKeysByWellKnownParty(@NotNull
                                                                                                                   ServiceHub serviceHub,
                                                                                                                   @NotNull
                                                                                                                   java.util.Collection<? extends java.security.PublicKey> publicKeys,
                                                                                                                   boolean ignoreUnrecognisedParties)

        Group each PublicKey by the well known party using the ServiceHub.identityService, in preparation for creating FlowSessions, for example.

        Parameters:
        publicKeys - the PublicKeys to group.
        ignoreUnrecognisedParties - if this is false, throw an exception if some of the PublicKeys cannot be mappedto a class Party.
        Returns:
        a map of well known class Party to associated PublicKeys.
        See Also:
        PublicKey, ServiceHub.identityService, FlowSession

        Group each PublicKey by the well known party using the ServiceHub.identityService, in preparation for creating FlowSessions, for example. Throw an exception if some of the PublicKeys cannot be mapped to a class Party.

        Parameters:
        publicKeys - the PublicKeys to group.
        Returns:
        a map of well known class Party to associated PublicKeys.
        See Also:

      • excludeNotary

        @NotNull
public static <T> java.util.Map<net.corda.core.identity.Party,T> excludeNotary(@NotNull
                                                                                        java.util.Map<net.corda.core.identity.Party,? extends T> map,
                                                                                        @NotNull
                                                                                        SignedTransaction stx)

        Remove the class Party associated with the notary of a class SignedTransaction from the a map of class Partys. It is a no-op if the notary is null.

        Returns:
        a new copy of the map, with the well known class Party for the notary removed.
        See Also:
        class Party, class SignedTransaction, class Party
